participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Fun-loving and sociable, she enjoys spending time with friends and has a vibrant energy.
participant_1.background: i just want to have fun with my friends. i don't drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i work took i've a part time job at burger king.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Caring and laid-back, he finds joy in the little things and enjoys sharing interests like movies with others.
participant_2.background: i am a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot.
